name: Investigation of the Impact of the I-94 ATM System on the Safety of the I-94 Commons High Crash Area
purpose: This report investigates the impact of the Variable Speed Limit (VSL) system on safety in a high-crash area on I-94 westbound through downtown Minneapolis. Using video data, traffic measurements, and machine vision sensors, the study applied a before-and-after analysis to assess crash rates and shockwave activity, aiming to enhance safety by reducing speed variations between upstream and downstream traffic.
author: John Hourdos, Stephen Zitzow
image_description: Points of interest (High crash areas) across I-94. This includes: Groveland Ave, Park Ave, Cedar Ave, Riverside Ave, 11th Ave, 1st Ave, Lowry Hill Tunnel Entry
